title: August Heat
description: Day 2 in the 12 Quickies of Christmas series Book 4 of the Men of August series Join the August Family for Christmas. It's been a little more than a year since Cade, Brock and Sam wrestled their lives back from the woman determined to destroy them. Join them in this first August family Christmas celebration, August Heat, and see if their wives have been naughty or nice, or if the brothers must show them once again how proper August wives should act.
author: Lora Leigh
